sourcesContent:
import React, { PureComponent } from 'react'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'
import { connect } from 'react-redux'
import {
  HeaderWrapper,
  Logo,
  LogoPic,
  Nav,
  NavItem,
  DropDownWrapper,
  DropDown,
  DropDownItem
} from './style'

class Header extends PureComponent {
  render () {
    return (
      <HeaderWrapper
        onClick={() => {
          console.log(this.props)
        }}
        className={this.props.isHomeMounted ? 'dark-theme' : ''}
      >
        <Logo>
          <Link to='/'>
            <LogoPic />
          </Link>
        </Logo>

        <Nav>
          <Link to='/'>
            <NavItem>首页</NavItem>
          </Link>
          <Link to='/explore'>
            <NavItem className='current-tab'>社区精选</NavItem>
          </Link>
          <Link to={this.props.match} className='business'>
            <NavItem>业务合作</NavItem>
            <DropDownWrapper className='drop-down-wrapper'>
              <DropDown>
                <DropDownItem>品牌号</DropDownItem>
                <DropDownItem>广告合作</DropDownItem>
                <DropDownItem>品牌合作人</DropDownItem>
                <DropDownItem>招商合作</DropDownItem>
              </DropDown>
            </DropDownWrapper>
          </Link>
          <Link to='/protocols/news'>
            <NavItem>新闻中心</NavItem>
          </Link>
          <Link to='/protocols/about'>
            <NavItem>关于我们</NavItem>
          </Link>
          <Link to='/protocols/liability'>
            <NavItem>社会责任</NavItem>
          </Link>
          <Link to={this.props.match}>
            <NavItem>加入我们</NavItem>
          </Link>
        </Nav>
      </HeaderWrapper>
    )
  }
}

const mapState = state => ({
  isHomeMounted: state.getIn(['home', 'isHomeMounted'])
})

export default connect(
  mapState,
  null
)(Header)
